issue.title: conventional-changelog-conventionalcommits@^7.0.0 not working with Lerna@7.2.0
issue.body:
I upgraded to `conventional-changelog-conventionalcommits@7.1.0` and use it with `Lerna@7.2.0` (latest as of this writing), and it just freezes up at:

```
lerna info getChangelogConfig Successfully resolved preset "conventional-changelog-conventionalcommits"
```

So I downgraded it to `conventional-changelog-conventionalcommits@7.0.0` and was able to see a little more about the error:

```
lerna info getChangelogConfig Auto-prefixing conventional-changelog preset "conventional-changelog-conventionalcommits"
lerna WARN getChangelogConfig Cannot find module './constants'
lerna WARN getChangelogConfig Require stack:
lerna WARN getChangelogConfig - /Users/someone/.nvm/versions/node/v18.17.1/lib/node_modules/conventional-changelog-conventionalcommits/index.js
lerna WARN getChangelogConfig - /Users/someone/.nvm/versions/node/v18.17.1/lib/node_modules/lerna/dist/index.js
lerna WARN getChangelogConfig - /Users/someone/.nvm/versions/node/v18.17.1/lib/node_modules/lerna/dist/cli.js
lerna ERR! EPRESET Unable to load conventional-changelog preset 'conventional-changelog-conventionalcommits'
```

Downgrading to `conventional-changelog-conventionalcommits@6.1.0` allowed Lerna to chug along.

Is there something that stands out here?  Please let me know if I should be filing an issue with Lerna instead.  Thanks!

comment.body: Created an issue at the Lerna repo: https://github.com/lerna/lerna/issues/3871

issue.title: `conventionalcommits` v7 breaks lerna `changelogPreset` integration
issue.body:
[Appium](https://github.com/appium/appium) has a `lerna.json` that has the following field:

```json
{
  "changelogPreset": "conventional-changelog-conventionalcommits"
}
```

Up until the v7 release, this worked as expected. After upgrading to v7+, the `lerna version` process exits immediately (and cleanly) after loading the conventionalcommits package, rather than proceeding with the versioning process.

I'm not entirely sure if this is something that needs to be fixed in lerna, or fixed here, but the change happened here so I'm reporting here.

Currently working around this issue by keeping the version of `conventional-changelog-conventionalcommits` pinned to `6.1.0`.

issue.body:
[Appium](https://github.com/appium/appium) has a `lerna.json` that has the following field:


Up until the v7 release, this worked as expected. After upgrading to v7+, the `lerna version` process exits immediately (and cleanly) after loading the conventionalcommits package, rather than proceeding with the versioning process.

I'm not entirely sure if this is something that needs to be fixed in lerna, or fixed here, but the change happened here so I'm reporting here.

Currently working around this issue by keeping the version of `conventional-changelog-conventionalcommits` pinned to `6.1.0`.
